title: Received Poro Icon but didn't receive Mystery Skin
body: I got my Poro Icon but I didn't get the Mystery Skin, since I already had RIOT Kayle. Any ideas on what's up?

replies.body:
Anyone who already owns Riot Kayle will get their mystery gift when the wave hits your account. We've had to send these out in waves due to the sheer amount of players being gifted. 

Please let me know if you're missing it by the 23rd.

Loggen in to upvote i have the same problem got the icon but no mystery skin as I already own Riot Kayle... 
RITO PLZ {{item:3070}}
